name: Decapitated David
description:
This game is for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2018 Game Jam of Genre without Mechanic. We created a platformer without the ability to directly move the player. In the game you are the head of the statue of David that an apprentice of Michelangelo cut from the main whilst inspecting the statue, the goal is to try and re-attach the head before Michelangelo gets back to the studio!

The game features 16 unique levels for you to play through, each more challenging than the last!



We hope you enjoy this Physics Based Puzzle platformer, we sure enjoyed making it!
